overview: Get ready for sweet treats galore in three delicious adventures! When Apple praises a cake of Strawberry's that's not so tasty, she must make it right in "The Berry Best Taste Test." Sour and Apple's pals encourage them to find a recipe for friendship in "The Berry Best Biscuit." And when the girls help Berrykin Bloom in the "Hot Sauce Cook Off," they soon discover how heated competition can get!
title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry Best Chef
